title: T-shirt, "Colors: Race"
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: Recto: Two full-length nude figures, side by side, centered, are covered from chest to mid-thigh by race and various other words imprinted in orange, green, blue and yellow in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Korean. COLORS in black is behind the figures' heads. Verso: COLORS, in black, is accompanied by the slogan, a magazine about the rest of the world, imprinted in orange and yellow type in the same six languages.

tombstone.epitaph:
T-shirt, "Colors: Race".
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-439.
